source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  biblios.ID_AGENCY as id_biblioteca,
	[BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].codi_indicador,
	count(*) as valor
FROM (
select DISTINCT [OUT LOC], taula.[RECORD #(PATRON)], taula.[P TYPE] 
		from [BEG_STG].[STG_BEG_FACT_PRESTECS] taula 
	 ) taula_aux
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR] 
		ON taula_aux.[P TYPE] = [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].[P_TYPE] and [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].DESC_CONSULTA = 'BEG_CONSULTA_01'
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_TERMINALS] term
		ON taula_aux.[OUT LOC] = term.ID_TERMINAL
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_BIBLIOTEQUES] biblios  
		ON biblios.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = term.CODI_BIBLIOTECA
group by biblios.ID_AGENCY, [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].codi_indicador

SELECT biblios.ID_AGENCY as id_biblioteca,
	[BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].codi_indicador,
	count(*) as valor
from [BEG_STG].[STG_BEG_FACT_PRESTECS] taula 
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR] 
		ON taula.[P TYPE] = [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].P_TYPE and [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].DESC_CONSULTA = 'BEG_CONSULTA_03'
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_TERMINALS] term
		ON taula.[OUT LOC] = term.ID_TERMINAL
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_BIBLIOTEQUES] biblios  
		ON biblios.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = term.CODI_BIBLIOTECA
group by biblios.ID_AGENCY, [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].codi_indicador

select biblios.ID_AGENCY as id_biblioteca,
	[BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].codi_indicador,
	count(*) as valor
from [BEG_STG].[STG_BEG_FACT_PRESTECS] taula 
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR] 
		ON taula.[I TYPE] = [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].P_TYPE and [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].DESC_CONSULTA = 'BEG_CONSULTA_04'
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_TERMINALS] term
		ON taula.[OUT LOC] = term.ID_TERMINAL
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_BIBLIOTEQUES] biblios  
		ON biblios.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = term.CODI_BIBLIOTECA
group by biblios.ID_AGENCY, [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].codi_indicador

select biblios.ID_AGENCY as id_biblioteca,
	[BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].codi_indicador,
	count(*) as valor
from [BEG_STG].[STG_BEG_FACT_PRESTECS] taula
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR] 
		ON taula.[I TYPE] = [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].p_type and [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].desc_consulta = 'BEG_CONSULTA_05'
	INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_TERMINALS]
		WHERE FLAG_AUTOPRESTEC = 1) term
			ON taula.[OUT LOC] = term.ID_TERMINAL
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_BIBLIOTEQUES] biblios  
		ON biblios.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = term.CODI_BIBLIOTECA
group by biblios.ID_AGENCY, [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].codi_indicador

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select biblios.ID_AGENCY as id_biblioteca,
	'IND_8_1311' as codi_indicador,
	count(*) as valor
from [BEG_STG].[STG_BEG_FACT_PRESTECS] taula 
	INNER JOIN (select ID_AGENCY, ID_LOCATION from [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_LOCATIONS] loc
inner join [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_BIBLIOTEQUES] bib
	on bib.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = loc.CODI_BIBLIOTECA) biblios  ON biblios.ID_AGENCY = taula.AGENCY 
	inner join (select ID_TERMINAL, ID_LOCATION from [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_TERMINALS] ter
inner join [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_LOCATIONS] loc2 on ter.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = loc2.CODI_BIBLIOTECA) biblios2 on biblios2.ID_TERMINAL = taula.[OUT LOC] 
where biblios.ID_LOCATION <> biblios2.ID_LOCATION 
	and	biblios2.ID_LOCATION = taula.LOCATION 
	and biblios.ID_LOCATION <> taula.LOCATION
group by biblios.ID_AGENCY

select biblios.ID_AGENCY as id_biblioteca,
	'IND_8_1312' as codi_indicador,
	count(*) as valor
from [BEG_STG].[STG_BEG_FACT_PRESTECS] taula 
	INNER JOIN (select ID_AGENCY, ID_LOCATION from [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_LOCATIONS] loc
inner join [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_BIBLIOTEQUES] bib
	on bib.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = loc.CODI_BIBLIOTECA) biblios  ON biblios.ID_AGENCY = taula.AGENCY 
	inner join (select ID_TERMINAL, ID_LOCATION from [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_TERMINALS] ter
inner join [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_LOCATIONS] loc2 on ter.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = loc2.CODI_BIBLIOTECA) biblios2 on biblios2.ID_TERMINAL = taula.[OUT LOC]
where biblios.ID_LOCATION <> biblios2.ID_LOCATION 
	and	biblios2.ID_LOCATION <> taula.LOCATION 
	and biblios.ID_LOCATION = taula.location
group by biblios.ID_AGENCY

select biblios2.ID_AGENCY as id_biblioteca,
	'IND_8_2311' as codi_indicador,
	count(*) as valor
from [BEG_STG].[STG_BEG_FACT_PRESTECS] taula 
	INNER JOIN (select ID_AGENCY, ID_LOCATION from [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_LOCATIONS] loc
inner join [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_BIBLIOTEQUES] bib
	on bib.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = loc.CODI_BIBLIOTECA) biblios  ON biblios.ID_AGENCY = taula.AGENCY 
	inner join (select ID_AGENCY, ID_TERMINAL, ID_LOCATION from [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_TERMINALS] ter
inner join [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_LOCATIONS] loc2 on ter.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = loc2.CODI_BIBLIOTECA
INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_BIBLIOTEQUES] b ON b.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = ter.CODI_BIBLIOTECA
	) biblios2 on biblios2.ID_TERMINAL = taula.[OUT LOC]
where biblios.ID_LOCATION <> biblios2.ID_LOCATION
	and	biblios2.ID_LOCATION = taula.LOCATION
	and biblios.ID_LOCATION <> taula.location
group by biblios2.ID_AGENCY

select biblios2.ID_AGENCY as id_biblioteca,
	'IND_8_2312' as codi_indicador,
	count(*) as valor
from [BEG_STG].[STG_BEG_FACT_PRESTECS] taula 
	INNER JOIN (select ID_AGENCY, ID_LOCATION from [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_LOCATIONS] loc
inner join [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_BIBLIOTEQUES] bib
	on bib.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = loc.CODI_BIBLIOTECA) biblios  ON biblios.ID_AGENCY = taula.AGENCY 
	inner join (select ID_AGENCY, ID_TERMINAL, ID_LOCATION from [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_TERMINALS] ter
inner join [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_LOCATIONS] loc2 on ter.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = loc2.CODI_BIBLIOTECA
INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_BIBLIOTEQUES] b ON b.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = ter.CODI_BIBLIOTECA
	) biblios2 on biblios2.ID_TERMINAL = taula.[OUT LOC]
where biblios.ID_LOCATION <> biblios2.ID_LOCATION 
	and	biblios2.ID_LOCATION <> taula.LOCATION 
	and biblios.ID_LOCATION = taula.location
group by biblios2.ID_AGENCY

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT  biblios.ID_AGENCY as id_biblioteca,
	[BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].codi_indicador,
	count(*) as valor, 
	CONVERT(date, ''',string(add(int(substring(pipeline().parameters.Data_Carrega,0,4)),-1)),''' + ''12'' + ''01'') as data_periode,
	convert(date,getdate()) as data_insercio
FROM (
select DISTINCT ID_OUT_LOC, taula.[CODI_RECORD_PATRON], taula.[NUM_P_TYPE] 
		from [BEG_STG].[STG_BEG_HIST_FACT_PRESTECS] taula 
		where YEAR(DATA_PERIODE) = ',string(add(int(substring(pipeline().parameters.Data_Carrega,0,4)),-1)),'
	 ) taula_aux
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR] 
		ON taula_aux.[NUM_P_TYPE] = [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].[P_TYPE] and [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].DESC_CONSULTA = ''BEG_CONSULTA_02''
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_TERMINALS] term
		ON taula_aux.[ID_OUT_LOC] = term.ID_TERMINAL
	INNER JOIN [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_BIBLIOTEQUES] biblios  
		ON biblios.CODI_BIBLIOTECA = term.CODI_BIBLIOTECA
group by biblios.ID_AGENCY, [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_REL_P_TYPE_INDICADOR].codi_indicador')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select b.CODI_BIBLIOTECA,'IND_1_3' as CODI_INDICADOR,
(coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dl_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(dl_mati_fi,dl_tarda_fi) as time)),0)
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dl_tarda_ini as time),cast(dl_tarda_fi as time)),0)
 
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dt_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(dt_mati_fi,dt_tarda_fi) as time)),0) 
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dt_tarda_ini as time),cast(dt_tarda_fi as time)),0)

+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dc_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(dc_mati_fi,dc_tarda_fi) as time)),0)
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dc_tarda_ini as time),cast(dc_tarda_fi as time)),0)

+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dj_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(dj_mati_fi,dj_tarda_fi) as time)),0) 
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dj_tarda_ini as time),cast(dj_tarda_fi as time)),0)

+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dv_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(dv_mati_fi,dv_tarda_fi) as time)),0) 
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dv_tarda_ini as time),cast(dv_tarda_fi as time)),0)

+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(ds_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(ds_mati_fi,ds_tarda_fi) as time)),0) 
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(ds_tarda_ini as time),cast(ds_tarda_fi as time)),0)

+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dg_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(dg_mati_fi,dg_tarda_fi) as time)),0) 
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dg_tarda_ini as time),cast(dg_tarda_fi as time)),0))

/60.0
 as IND_VALOR
